article.title: Northrop Grumman Wins Contract For Brunei Joint Operatons Center C4ISR System
article.author: Henry Kenyon
article.text: Northrop Grumman Corporation has been awarded a contract by the Ministry of Defence of Brunei Darussalam to provide a joint operations center command and control capability for the Royal Brunei Armed Forces. Under the contract, which will be undertaken by Northrop Grumman UK, the company will supply an integrated command, control, communications, computers, intelligence, surveillance and reconnaissance (C4ISR) headquarters system and a deployable joint operations center together with providing training and in-country support.
